availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James L. Turman (Boyd County, Kentucky, farmer and tavern keeper and farmer)

body.p: Boyd County, Kentucky, farmer and tavern keeper. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret Turman. Father of James R. Turman, John J.C. Turman, Belvidere Turman, Samuel A. Turman, Benjamin Turman, Sabrina M. Turman, Pamelia Turman. Farmer in Lawrence County in 1850. Farmer in Boyd County in 1860. Tavern keeper in Boyd County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence, 96A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyd County, Cattlettsburg, p. 14.
KYR-0001-004-0044.
